main.name: Will Sutter
main.description: Most comfortable with Javascript and related technologies as well as Java and Python. Currently branching out and always interested in learning new things!
main.bio: I enjoy playing basketball, video games, wakeboarding, climbing, mountain biking, listening to music and am currently trying to learn how to play the guitar!
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me anytime! Contact info is listed just below on the right.

resume.skillmessage: Here is a list of my skills along with my proficiency with them

education.description: Explored full-stack web development with JavaScript, React, jQuery, Java, and explored several other technologies in an accelerated 20 week program.
Learned Java and Python and explored programming concepts in my undergraduate program for two years.

work.title: Service Desk Analyst
work.description: Helped callers with account issues, software, and hardware troubleshooting. Worked with Citrix, Azure, Cisco, Microsoft Office, and mostly troubleshot internal applications and accounts. Worked tickets via Service Now while I was off the phone and escalated anything as needed to the proper team. Monitored networks and servers company-wide and created immediate alerts should one go offline.

work.title: Service Desk Technician III
work.description: Helped callers with account issues, software, and hardware troubleshooting. Worked with Citrix, Azure, Five9, Tableau, Microsoft Office, and internal applications during troubleshooting. Worked tickets via Service Now while I was off the phone and escalated anything as needed to the proper team. Kept Modivcare's support knowledge database up to date whenever possible.

work.title: IT Assistant
work.description: Assisted 80 fellow co-workers with anything relating to information technology.

work.title: Computer Sales Associate
work.description: Worked in a professional setting selling computers and computing accessories.

projects.title: Kodrich Associates
projects.category: Home website for Kodrich Associates, Inc. Made for a client needing a website for users that need information about the company and what the client has to offer.

projects.title: Star Trails
projects.category: Two week solo project - space themed Oregon Trail game reboot with authentication built solely on React

projects.title: Rapid Interface
projects.category: (NOT YET DEPLOYED PUBLICLY) Developed in a group with a client for two weeks to rebuild their front end to work with their established backend.

testimonials.text: You're bright in intelligence and personality! You always brought high energy to the room and I admire your ability to laugh and smile through the difficult times.
Appreciate that you are always willing to give the shirt off your back and keeping things interesting
